"every day we stray further and further away from god"

By trimming the seemingly useless fat of an introduction section, Marcus reminds us of its importance. He flings us into an ocean of passes, and despite us being aware of this ocean and its functions- it still baffels us. We have been suckling of the teat of internet content for years and have grown accustomed to its internal rules and regulations. Marcus violently rips us from these expectations and cuts directly to the bone of entertainment. It takes minutes for him to say a word other than those displayed in the title yet we see emotions burst in all directions, a grandiose finale of fireworks that the entire experience of pokemon, Markaplier, and the “smash or pass” trend has seemingly lead up to. Phenomenal.
